title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not always close the file.
EB: It should close the file as no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application with build 20020508 and the latest UI code.
2. Open any file.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
